item.title: Fitting theoretical model to data in python
item.description: There are several data fitting utilities available. We will focus on two: scipy.optimize lmfit.minimize Using both those modules, you can fit any arbitrary function that you define and it is, also, possible to constrain given parameters during the fit. Another important aspect is that both packages come with useful diagnostic tools. Fitting Basics The fitting we discuss here is an iterative process. First, we define our desired function, and calculate values given certain parameters
